content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you with your electrical needs today? May I have your name to better assist you?
Hi, actually, I was going to get some help with an electrical outlet but I think I changed my mind. I don't need anything right now.
Thank you for letting us know! If you ever need electrical or home services in the future, please donâ€™t hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
reason: Customer changed mind about needing service
